title: Get a transfer run
description: Retrieves information about a specific transfer run from the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.

objective.narrative: This sample shows how to fetch the details of a single transfer run, which includes its state (such as PENDING, RUNNING, SUCCEEDED, or FAILED), start time, and end time. This is useful for building automated workflows, monitoring dashboards, or alerting systems that depend on the outcome of a data transfer.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_transferrun_get
regionTags.title: Get a transfer run
regionTags.description: Retrieves information about a specific transfer run from the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.
